name: Cabbage Runner
description:
After the Climate Catastrophe, you are forced to turn to a hunter-gatherer lifestyle. Can you brave the wild and collect enough food to survive? 

Made for the Stanford 2019 Spring Game Jam. Assets from Sunny Land (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/sunny-land-103349) and Free Pixel Food (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/free-pixel-food-113523)

Note: the text was not implemented well within the time limit, so you need to resize the window to the dimensions shown in the screenshots for the text to display properly.
